## `SetFilePathDisplayMode`

Sets how file paths are displayed in the lists for batch projects.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
SetFilePathDisplayMode(FilePathDisplayMode mode)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| [`FilePathDisplayMode`](#filepathdisplaymode) mode | How file paths should be displayed. |
:::
